nodes.text: Lobis Lobin was a Jedi Knight who lived during the waning days of the Galactic Republic. During the Clone Wars, Lobin served the Republic as a Jedi General. In 22 BBY, Lobin was killed along with seven other Jedi during the Confederate General Grievous's attack on the planet Falleen.
Lobin was first mentioned in the novel The Clone Wars: Wild Space written by Karen Miller and published in 2008.
